actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

actions.in_committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

official_title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bayderm Bottom DLV.

summary.text: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2009, the duty on Aqueous polyurethane dispersions containing 39% or greater content of Propanoic acid, 3-hydroxy-2-(hydroxymethyl)-2-methyl-, polymer with 2-[(2-aminoethyl)amino]ethanesulfonic acid monosodium salt, 1,6-diisocyanatohexane, diphenyl carbonate, 1,2-ethanediamine, 1,6-hexanediol, hydrazine, methyloxirane, oxirane and 1,2-propanediol, 2-(2-butoxyethoxy)ethanol-blocked (Bayderm Bottom DLV).

titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Bayderm Bottom DLV.
